description: little girl wearing a striped dress, lying with eyes closed on a mat on the ground; little boy with his head lowered squatting on mat at girl's feet with a cup on the ground in front of him; Arabic text written in chalk on the ground in front of mat
markings: in pencil at lower right corner on back: [3/3/93]
signed: in pencil, at top edge on back: [David Parker Beggars, Mumbai, India, 1993/Umbai/(Bombay)]
title: Beggars, Mumbai (Bombay), India
